title: Food: General (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the General subcategory within Food. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.romaji: Suika wa, natsu no kudamono desu.
cards.japanese: スイカは、夏の果物です。

cards.romaji: Ky.ri wa, natsu no yasai desu.
cards.japanese: きゅうりは、夏の野菜です。

cards.english: Cutting up an onion makes your eyes tear up.
cards.romaji: Tamanegi o kiru to namida ga deru.
cards.japanese: たまねぎを切ると涙が出る。

cards.english: Carrots are good for your health.
